reviewText: No matter what the results are it is still inspiring. Showing a picture of the Roman Catapult is nothing as compared to watching this. My students realize that 2000 years ago people were extreemly smart to come up with something that our modern science has a lot of problems with. They also get excited with trying to make small models of this.  It is engaging, sparks the imagination, and is fun for the students and teacher alike.
